2024.02.26

Joomla package/file AssetGhsvs 2024.02.26

Joomla file package. Different versions of asset files that I often need. For example, Bootstrap, JQuery, JQuery-Slim. The assets are stored in Joomla folder `/media/assetghsvs/. Not more.

### Download
[pkg_file_assetghsvs-2024.02.26.zip](https://github.com/GHSVS-de/pkg_file_assetghsvs/raw/2024.02.26/dist/pkg_file_assetghsvs-2024.02.26.zip)

### Joomla-Target-Platform(s)
3.&ast;<br>4.&ast;<br>5.&ast;

#### Package contains
- bootstrap v4.6.2 ("The most popular front-end framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web.")
- bootstrap v5.1.3 ("The most popular front-end framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web.")
- bootstrap v5.2.3 ("The most popular front-end framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web.")
- bootstrap v5.3.3 ("The most popular front-end framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web.")
- bootstrap-sass v3.3.7 ("bootstrap-sass is a Sass-powered version of Bootstrap 3, ready to drop right into your Sass powered applications.")
- bootstrap-sass v3.4.3 ("bootstrap-sass is a Sass-powered version of Bootstrap 3, ready to drop right into your Sass powered applications.")
- dropzone v5.9.3 ("Handles drag and drop of files for you.")
- dropzone v6.0.0-beta.2 ("Handles drag and drop of files for you.")
- jquery v3.7.1 ("JavaScript library for DOM operations")
- jquery-migrate v3.4.1 ("Migrate older jQuery code to jQuery 3.0+")
